settings.heading:
Durable Dog Seat Covers,
Cargo Liners and Accessories
settings.description:
Bring your dogs on every adventure with durable,
high-quality products built to last.
Heavy-duty, functional dog seat covers designed to withstand wear and tear.
Pet accessories that make traveling with your dog fun and convenient.
Keep your dog safe, happy, and healthy on every adventure, big or small.

settings.heading: High-Quality Products Built to Last
settings.description: Our seat covers are designed with padded & quilted fabric that’s easy to take care of and can withstand wear and tear. We offer a lifetime warranty on every product.

settings.heading: Design and Function Meet Convenience
settings.description: Our patented technology is easy to maintain and made with colorfast fabrics that won’t fade. Our proprietary design lets you access all your seat belts and move seats without removing the cover.

settings.heading: Keeping Pets Safe, Happy and Healthy
settings.description: Our pet seat covers feature a non-slip backing and fasten in place with sturdy seat anchors, keeping your dog safe while in motion. Our products are also free of AZO dyes and heavy metals.

settings.heading: Products That Enable You to Provide the Best Possible Life for Your Best Friend

settings.quote:
Perfectly sized to fit. Love the material;
seems extremely tough
settings.author: Hugh C.

settings.heading: Meet Jim & Maggie
settings.description:
Every business starts with an idea. Ours started in the car, when we realized our dobermans had torn yet another dog seat cover. We wanted to keep our dogs comfortable in the car while keeping our vehicle clean, but we couldn’t find a good solution. Regular seat covers just couldn't stand up to the dog fur, nails, and muddy messes that come along with so many adventures.

We knew we weren’t the only ones with this problem, so we set out to solve it. Five years and more than 11 iterations later, we found the perfect prototype for a durable, high-quality dog seat cover that will withstand any adventure and last for years to come.

settings.heading: Flying Fur Animal Rescue
settings.description: Since 2015, Paul has saved over 1600 furry friends from euthanasia by transporting them from from high-kill shelters in the south to no-kill shelters in the northeast.

settings.heading: Pets With Disabilities
settings.description: Mike and Joyce recognized a great need for a support system for disabled pets, and this grassroots nonprofit was born! It has evolved into a thriving rescue, rehab center, and adoption resource for disabled animals.

settings.heading: Companions for Heroes
settings.description: Companions for Heroes’ vision is to help every American hero while saving shelter and rescue animals from euthanasia. Since its inception, C4H has paired over 3,500 heroes with shelter dogs.

settings.heading: Giving Back To The Animal Community
settings.description: As a pet-focused business, we are passionate about giving back to the animal community. We donate returned items and a percentage of each sale to animal advocacy groups.
